events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes two weeks ago and I want to request a refund because they do not fit and I no longer want to keep them.
System has categorized this customer request under the cluster 'Refund' based on keywords related to return and money back.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who handles returns and reimbursement inquiries.

We will send you a prepaid return shipping label. Once we receive the shoes and verify their condition, we will process a full refund to your original payment method.
Great, thank you for handling this promptly. I appreciate the prepaid label and quick refund process.
